column5: Beautiful 3-story modern townhome on quiet street lined with Oak trees. Access near major highways  (59, 610, I-45, I-10). Unbeatable proximity to Downtown/Theatre District (1.5 miles) and Museum District (2 miles). Convenient access to running trails on Memorial Park & Buffalo Bayou. Unique walkable neighborhood; stroll to multiple restaurants, popular night spots & grocery store. Walking distance to Light Rail with instant access to downtown, Medical Center & NRG. Multiple bus stops nearby.
column8: Private Room in Beautiful Midtown Home
